text:
After their fairytale wedding in Italy, Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are still celebrating in ways more than one. From dance party to hosting reception parties, the couple is making the most of their wedding break.
While they are gearing up for their last reception in Mumbai for their fraternity friends, the couple was spotted at Mumbai's Siddhivinayak Temple. Like always, paps were more than elated to spot and click their favourite #DeepVeer.
Viral Bhayani
Paps can't stop calling them 'Baba and Bhabhiji' and the way DeepVeer chuckle on this, says it all. Deepika and Ranveer share a very healthy and symbiotic relationship with the media and that's not the only reason why the couple is adored and respected by the fans and their pap friends. They have time and again proved how they are two of the most grounded individuals.
After their grand Mumbai reception, the couple was spotted in Mumbai while they were headed out to seek blessings of God at Siddhivinayak Temple, Mumbai. Fans crowded the couple and screamed so that they could wish them too. Even paps were seen in a light mood as they clicked their favorite #DeepVeer. The couple was accompanied by their families.
